message:
https://archive.ph/comic

神奇的对时间感的掌握

相当客观但是十分挑逗地色情的描写

但建议词汇量远超一万阅读
She realized that he was picking at the cloth of her dress, which had stuck to her damp skin when she sat pressed against the chair back.
What she had to go through was wave after wave of intense recollection.
title: What Is Remembered - Alice Munro
